text:
Elizabeth Smart kidnapper Wanda Barzee released from prison

Smart, who was held captive for nine months when she was 14 by Barzee and her husband, has said she believes Barzee is a "threat" who shouldn't be freed.
title: Elizabeth Smart kidnapper Wanda Barzee released from prison

twitter.title: Elizabeth Smart kidnapper Wanda Barzee released from prison
twitter.description: Smart, who was held captive for nine months when she was 14 by Barzee and her husband, has said she believes Barzee is a "threat" who shouldn't be freed.

meta_data.description: A woman serving time for her role in the abduction of Elizabeth Smart, the Utah woman who was held captive when she was 14 years old, was released from prison on Wednesday.
